## indexToUV variable

Converts linearized 2D index `i` into a vec2 UV coord, based on given texture `size` (in pixels).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
indexToUV: import("@thi.ng/shader-ast").TaggedFn2<"int", "ivec2", "vec2">
```
